transgender: one who does not identify with their assigned sex at birth
nonbinary: one who does not identify on the binary gender spectrum
gender dysphoria: clinical distress caused by a difference in gender identity and sex
gender euphoria: comfort or positive feeling from being associated with one's true identity
gender expression: an external display of one's gender identity
gender identity: a self defined concept of one's own gender
gender non-conforming: to behave in a way that does not align with traditional structures around a gender
genderqueer: one who rejects the societal sorting of gender, opting to understand it with a more fluid approach
